metadata.description: The COUNTDOWN to the brand new WONDERLAND ongoing series begins here!!! The Jabberwocky has been defeated. The Queen of Hearts is dead and Wonderland is in a state of chaos with no ruler on the throne. Enter the Red Knight who is determined to destroy all of Wonderland and the world at large by unleashing a deadly ancient force long thought to be gone. Meanwhile on earth, a literary student researching Lovecraft will discover a long forgotten secret that could save or damn us all. Don't miss out on this incredible mini-series that sets the stage for the upcoming Wonderland ongoing series!
metadata.name: Call of Wonderland
